/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the background, showcasing the architectural diversity of the area. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
